column4: none of my drives are mounting,i uninstalled i bunch of stuff i thouhgt was uneeded is there a package that automounts stuff,like my cdrom/usb?
my cdrom is working and my usb drive isnt showing up anywhere
procbususb on /proc/bus/usb type usbfs (rw) thats form mount is that my usb?
Look for it in dmesg, it should have an sdx assignment
did you help me with this yesterday?i was WaxyFresh on irc
631.307701]  SCSI device sda: 156301488 512-byte hdwr sectors (80026 MB)
There you go then, mount that and you'll have access to it. That's kinda basic Linux "skillz"
sudo mount /dev/sda1 /where/ever" you need the partition number if it has one
